    private void depositarActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                          
        // TODO add your handling code here:
         double sacar = Double.parseDouble(valor.getText());
        double saldo = 34;
        saldo = saldo + sacar;
        resultado2.setText(Double.toString(saldo));
    }                                         

    private void sacarActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        double sacar = Double.parseDouble(valor.getText());
        double saldo = 34;
        saldo = saldo - sacar;
        resultado2.setText(Double.toString(saldo));
        
    }                                     

    private void saldoActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                      
        // TODO add your handling code here:
        int saldo = 34;
         resultado2.setText(Double.toString(saldo));
    }

     * @param args the command line arguments
